886840.name: Fur Fury
886840.description: Third person tactical action in flag capture mode. Players have to split into two teams and confront each other.  Protect your house or try to steal treats – choice is yours! Join one of the teams, plan tactics and try to win! Several game modes, dozens of objects to interact with, exciting gameplay and pretty graphics – all in one!  Six character classes, interactive environment and customization are waiting for you in team play game – FurFury. Remember, everything can turn against you any moment!
886840.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 繁体中文, 俄语, 波兰语
